Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= man; ◄ son of Amon (אָמֹון) ► king of Judah (יְהוּדָה) (ca. 640 609)
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which a countable entity is four in number
= period of time, measured by a complete cycle in the phases of the moon
= state in which a countable entity is the first or the previous in a range
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= causative action by which humans cause other humans to be mentally strong and able to deal with issues relating their daily work, good leadership, and war

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= member of the Levite clan, responsible for temple duties

Node.gloss: to instruct|to give instruction|to teach|to give understanding|to explain
Node.definition: = pattern of actions by which someone helps others to gain knowledge and understanding by observing carefully in order to see through the outward appearance of things and grasp their essence

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= state in which people, objects and places have undergone the rituals that are required to make them fit to be in the presence of God or to be used in his service

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= wooden box, overlaid with gold and with a golden cover with cherubs, normally placed behind the veil in the tabernacle or temple, but also carried along during military campaigns; ► symbolizing the presence of YHWH among his people and used to store the two tablets with the law of God and other objects representing important events in the history of Israel
= state in which by which humans or objects have become part of the realm of God and his service ► and therefore no longer accessible to humans unless they have gone through special rituals

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one
= man; ◄ son of David (דָּוִד) tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► king of Judah and Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) given the name Jedidiah (יְדִידְיָהּ) at his birth
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= the joint between each arm and the main part of the human body; ► often used for carrying heavy weights
= a reference to the actual time when a particular event takes place

= action by which humans, either as individuals or as groups, assume a position of subservience towards a deity, perform the required rituals, and live in accordance with the requirements of that deity

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

Node.gloss: to be established|to endure|to be secure
Node.definition: literally: to be established; hence: = process by which a condition becomes stable and can be expected to last for a long time
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household
= a group of people to which one traces one's ancestry; ◄ smallest unit within family group
= a group of people within a larger group, placed together for a particular task or duty
= a written document, written on an unspecified surface
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= a written document, written on an unspecified surface
= man; ◄ son of David (דָּוִד) tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► king of Judah and Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) given the name Jedidiah (יְדִידְיָהּ) at his birth
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= the tabernacle or temple of YHWH, described in terms of its holiness
= a group of people within a larger group, placed together for a particular task or duty
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household
= a group of people to which one traces one's ancestry; ◄ smallest unit within family group
= member of same family, clan, tribe, or ethnic group
= member of a larger group of related people or objects, ◄ referred to as a child of that larger group
= group of people ◄ that is part of a larger group that has been divided; ► usually with a specific duty assigned to them
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household
= a group of people to which one traces one's ancestry; ◄ smallest unit within family group
= member of the Levite clan, responsible for temple duties
= action by which humans perform the rituals that allow them to be in the presence of a deity

Node.gloss: to prepare|to make ready|to make provisions (for something)
Node.definition: = causative action where humans or deities make objects ready for use
= member of same family, clan, tribe, or ethnic group

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
literally: by the hand (of someone); hence: = process by which a certain event is carried out by an intermediary (person) or instrument (object)
= man; ◄ son of Amram (עַמְרָם) and Jochebed (יֹוכֶבֶד) younger brother of Miriam (מִרְיָם) and Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► leader of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) during exodus
literally: to lift up; hence: = causative action by which humans devote certain things to a deity
= man; ◄ son of Amon (אָמֹון) ► king of Judah (יְהוּדָה) (ca. 640 609)
= member of a larger group of related people or objects, ◄ referred to as a child of that larger group

= group of small domestic animals traveling and feeding together; ◄ consisting of sheep and goats; ► hair or wool shorn for weaving into cloth; female milked for food; may be killed and eaten for meat; used as sacrificial animal; ≈ associated with large quantities and also with God's people, who are often seen as a flock with God as their shepherd
= young of a sheep (שֶׂה) either male or female; ► eaten at Passover, and used for sacrifice; its fleece is used for clothing
= direct offspring of animals, either male or indeterminate

= a fairly small, female domestic animal, usually black and with floppy ears, hooves and relatively short hair, and usually found in one single flock (צֹאן) with sheep; ► raised for its milk, meat, and skin; a clean animal and therefore to be eaten
literally: to be found (in a place); hence: = state in which humans or objects are located in a certain place
= the quantity of a number of objects or the frequency of a number of events
= state in which a countable entity is thirty in number
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times

= large ruminant animals with horns and cloven hoofs, ► chiefly domesticated for meat or milk, as beasts of burden, or for pulling a cart or a plow; it is a clean animal and can be eaten and sacrificed; ≈ regarded as a sign of wealth
= state in which a countable entity is three in number
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times
= marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= someone in a position of authority in an army, at a royal court, of a town, within a family, among priests, or elsewhere
= state in which humans are willing to perform a certain task and show that by their actions
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= member of the Levite clan, responsible for temple duties
literally: to lift up; hence: = causative action by which humans devote certain things to a deity
= man; ◄ tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► Levite; time of king Josiah (יֹאשִׁיָּהוּ)
= man; ► Levite; time of king Josiah (יֹאשִׁיָּהוּ)
= a person in a position of high authority over a nation, a division of priests or levites, or an army

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times
= state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number

= large ruminant animals with horns and cloven hoofs, ► chiefly domesticated for meat or milk, as beasts of burden, or for pulling a cart or a plow; it is a clean animal and can be eaten and sacrificed; ≈ regarded as a sign of wealth

= son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not

= member of the Levite clan, responsible for temple duties

= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times

= state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number

= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= member of the Levite clan, responsible for temple duties
= a group of people within a larger group, placed together for a particular task or duty
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= causative action by which someone takes a quantity of a dry substance or a liquid with one's hand and scatters it over an object
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others

Node.gloss: to hold, carry, have (in one's luggage)
Node.definition: literally: in (one's) hand; hence: = state of carrying an object physically in one's hand or as part of one's luggage
= member of the Levite clan, responsible for temple duties
= action by which the skin is removed from an animal
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household
= a group of people to which one traces one's ancestry; ◄ smallest unit within family group
= member of a larger group of related people or objects, ◄ referred to as a child of that larger group
= causative action by which humans cause other humans or animals to move to a location relatively close to the location in focus
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which humans or deities mark letters, words or other symbols on a surface, such as clay, stone, skin, or papyrus, usually with a pointed stylus or reed
= written document; made of papyrus or parchment; either as a single sheet or several sheets sewn together and rolled for storage
= man; ◄ son of Amram (עַמְרָם) and Jochebed (יֹוכֶבֶד) younger brother of Miriam (מִרְיָם) and Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► leader of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) during exodus

= large ruminant animals with horns and cloven hoofs, ► chiefly domesticated for meat or milk, as beasts of burden, or for pulling a cart or a plow; it is a clean animal and can be eaten and sacrificed; ≈ regarded as a sign of wealth
literally: boiled in fire; hence: = causative process by which humans prepare food for consumption by holding it close to the fire for a prolonged period

= state of burning, in which substances combine chemically with oxygen from the air and give out bright light, heat, and smoke; ► used for cooking, melting, cleansing, heating, and destroying; ≈ many aspects of life are compared with fire, such as anger, jealousy, aggression, wickedness, words, life, certain sicknesses, suffering, etc.
literally: a ruling or decision; hence: = a law or ordinance handed down by a ruler or a deity that a particular group of people is expected to obey
= state in which by which humans or objects have become part of the realm of God and his service ► and therefore no longer accessible to humans unless they have gone through special rituals
= causative process by which humans prepare food for consumption by immersing it in boiling water for a prolonged period
= a rounded container ◄ usually made of ceramic or metal ► used for storage or cooking
= a container ◄ made of iron or ceramics; ► used for boiling food; ≈ associated with steam and smoke
= a flat dish; ► for holding food for eating or serving
= member of a larger group of related people or objects, ◄ referred to as a child of that larger group
= referent to the time after the event in focus

Node.gloss: to prepare|to make ready|to make provisions (for something)
Node.definition: = causative action where humans or deities make objects ready for use
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others

literally: to make go up; hence: = causative process by which humans offer a burnt offering and cause its smoke to go up
= fat parts ◄ of the body of animals and human beings; ► often the main ingredient of a sacrifice; ≈ regarded as the best part of the meat, but also associated with unresponsiveness and stubbornness
particle linking an event to a point in time; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in time Y
= the time of day that is characterized by darkness; ≈ associated with sleep, fear, evil, and hardship
= member of the Levite clan, responsible for temple duties

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

Node.gloss: to go up|to climb up|to mount
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals or objects go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot, carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle

= king of Egypt (מִצְרַיִם) who defeated king Josiah (יֹאשִׁיָּהוּ) of Judah (יְהוּדָה) who wanted to keep him from helping the Assyrians (אַשּׁוּר) in their battle against Nebuchadnezzar (נְבוּכַדְנֶאצַּר) king of Babylon (בָּבֶל)
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name
= action by which humans or deities engage in a confrontation with (other) humans
= town; ◄ on the Euphrates (פְּרָת) ► location where Nebuchadnezzar (נְבוּכַדְנֶאצַּר) defeated the Assyrians (אַשּׁוּר) and the Egyptians (מִצְרַיִם)
= river, usually identified with the Euphrates; ◄ running through Mesopotamia; ► one of the four rivers flowing from the garden of Eden (עֵדֶן)

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= action by which humans purposefully move in the direction of (another) human, deity, or object to engage with them
= man; ◄ son of Amon (אָמֹון) ► king of Judah (יְהוּדָה) (ca. 640 609)
= causative action by which humans or deities commission one or more agents to go to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task
= a human or supernatural being who carries a message on behalf of someone else

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household
= armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= action by which humans or divine beings cause (other) humans to act quickly

Node.gloss: to give up|to leave alone|to ignore
Node.definition: = action by which human or deities stop with an implicit action that affects (other) humans, animals, or objects
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to turn (one's) face|to look away|to leave (someone) alone
Node.definition: literally: to turn (one's) face (from someone); hence: = action by which humans or deities refrain from engaging in an activity involving another party
= man; ◄ son of Amon (אָמֹון) ► king of Judah (יְהוּדָה) (ca. 640 609)
= action by which humans or deities engage in a confrontation with (other) humans
= causative action by which humans make themselves unrecognizable by others ◄ by changing one's appearance or clothing

= king of Egypt (מִצְרַיִם) who defeated king Josiah (יֹאשִׁיָּהוּ) of Judah (יְהוּדָה) who wanted to keep him from helping the Assyrians (אַשּׁוּר) in their battle against Nebuchadnezzar (נְבוּכַדְנֶאצַּר) king of Babylon (בָּבֶל)
= an opening in the lower part of the face of humans and animals through which food and air are taken and vocal sounds are emitted
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= action by which humans or deities engage in a confrontation with (other) humans
= a more or less flat and relatively low region, usually between uplands, hills or mountains, and following the course of a stream

= town; ◄ located to the southwest of Valley of Jizreel (יִזְרְעֶאל) territory of Manasseh (מְנַשֶּׁה) ► former Canaanite (כְּנַעֲנִי) kingdom; location where king Josiah (יֹאשִׁיָּהוּ) of Judah (יְהוּדָה) was killed during his battle with Pharaoh Neco (נְכֹה)
= causative action by which humans launch arrows (חֵץ) with the help of a bow (קֶשֶׁת)
= soldier who shoots with bow and arrows
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= man; ◄ son of Amon (אָמֹון) ► king of Judah (יְהוּדָה) (ca. 640 609)

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God
= causative action by which humans or deities cause humans to lose their physical strength

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God
= open vehicle with two or four wheels, pulled by one or more horses; ◄ made or wood and iron; ► used in war or for travelling
= causative action by which humans or deities make (other) humans ride on a domestic animal such as a donkey (חֲמֹור) or a horse (סוּס) in a chariot (מֶרְכָּבָה) or on a cart (עֲגָלָה)
= open vehicle with two or four wheels, pulled by one or more horses; ◄ made of wood and iron; ► used in war or for travelling
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= causative action or process by which humans or deities cause (other) humans or objects to move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression

= to put the body of someone who died in a designated place, such as a hole in a rock or in the ground, or in a place which was constructed specifically for this purpose; ≈ associated with death, but also with honor and respect

= place where one or more people are buried, such as a hole in a rock or in the ground, or a place which was constructed specifically for this purpose; ≈ associated with death, stench and decay, uncleanness
= indirect male progenitor

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
= to experience grief and show this by one's actions; ◄ caused by bereavement, loss, or other difficult circumstances
= man; ◄ son of Amon (אָמֹון) ► king of Judah (יְהוּדָה) (ca. 640 609)

Node.gloss: to lament|to mourn|to bewail in a song
Node.definition: = to sing a song in which one expresses one's grief at the loss of a loved one or the destruction of a town or nation
= man; ◄ son of Hilkiah (חִלְקִיָּה) ► prophet (נָבִיא)
= man; ◄ son of Amon (אָמֹון) ► king of Judah (יְהוּדָה) (ca. 640 609)

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= action by which one utters words with a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not
= action by which one utters words with a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not
= a sung dirge or lament at the death of a loved one; ◄ death of a friend or family member; ► expression of loss at one's death
= man; ◄ son of Amon (אָמֹון) ► king of Judah (יְהוּדָה) (ca. 640 609)
particle linking an event to a point in time; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in time Y

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= patterns of behavior that a community expects its members to follow

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= action by which humans or deities mark letters, words or other symbols on a surface, such as clay, stone, skin, or papyrus, usually with a pointed stylus or reed
= a sung dirge or lament at the death of a loved one; ◄ death of a friend or family member; ► expression of loss at one's death
= events that have taken place, that are not among a range of events that have been described or dealt with in a certain way; used for acts of kings only
= man; ◄ son of Amon (אָמֹון) ► king of Judah (יְהוּדָה) (ca. 640 609)

= state in which humans or deities are committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions; these obligations include responsibilities towards kinspeople, spouses, friends, covenant partners, and people to whom one is indebted as a result of favors received
= action by which humans or deities mark letters, words or other symbols on a surface, such as clay, stone, skin, or papyrus, usually with a pointed stylus or reed
= causative action by which humans or deities offer instruction to (other) humans, ► aimed to teach the recipients wisdom and good behavior
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which a countable entity is the first or the previous in a range
= pertaining to being the latest in a chronological range of events, which may be situated in either past, present, or future
= action by which humans or deities mark letters, words or other symbols on a surface, such as clay, stone, skin, or papyrus, usually with a pointed stylus or reed

Node.gloss: The Book of the Chronicles of the Kings of Israel and Judah
Node.definition: = a book containing the events of the reigns of the kings of Israel and Judah
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district
